instructions.name: oracle_initialize
docs: This function initializes an oracle for token price data

accounts.name: protocol
docs: The protocol account this oracle belongs to

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Mint address of the token this oracle is for

accounts.name: wsol_buffer
docs: CHECK Safe only for buffer authority

accounts.name: protocol
docs: The protocol account this vault belongs to

accounts.name: deposit_token_mint
docs: The deposit token mint

accounts.name: protocol
docs: The protocol account this vault belongs to

accounts.name: deposit_token_mint
docs: Mint address of the deposit token

accounts.name: share_token_mint
docs: Mint address of the share token (LP token)

accounts.name: vault
docs: The vault for the operation

errors.name: InvalidOracleTypeLength
errors.msg: Oracle type length must be greater than 0

errors.name: OracleConfDeviated
errors.msg: Oracle confidence exceeded max allowed deviation from price

errors.name: InvalidPythAccount
errors.msg: Account passed is not owned by Pyth program

errors.name: InvalidAddress
errors.msg: Address cannot be default public key

errors.name: ProtocolNotSupported
errors.msg: Activity on the protocol is not supported

errors.name: ProtocolNotActivated
errors.msg: Vault activity on the protocol not activated

errors.name: NAVNotRefreshed
errors.msg: Vault NAV has not been refreshed

errors.name: InvalidMappingMint
errors.msg: Mint provided does not match the mapping mint

errors.name: NoMatchingMintInPosition
errors.msg: Mapping mint not found in spot position

fields.name: price
docs: Price is only stored in f64 and never calculated directly due to lack of floating Rust type support

fields.name: protocol
docs: Protocol this oracle belongs to

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint that this oracle provides price data for

fields.name: id
docs: Unique identifier for this oracle

fields.name: state_flags
docs: Bitfield for various platform-level state.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump used for PDA derivation.

fields.name: treasury_bump
docs: Bump used for PDA derivation.

fields.name: platform_fee_bps
docs: Fee taken from vault profits, in basis points.

fields.name: admin
docs: Authority of protocol.

fields.name: protocols_integrated
docs: Number of protocols integrated, supports up to 255.

fields.name: active_integrations
docs: Bitfield for protocol integrations that are active.
Each bit represents a protocol integration, where 1 is active and 0 is inactive.

fields.name: is_kamino
docs: Protocol Integrations

fields.name: lookup_table
docs: Vault Look Up Table

fields.name: pubkey
docs: Unique Address of the vault

fields.name: manager
docs: Manager of the Vault

fields.name: protocol
docs: Protocol associated with this vault

fields.name: vault_authority
docs: Vault authority (PDA)

fields.name: deposit_token_mint
docs: Mint address of the Vault's accepted deposit token

fields.name: share_token_mint
docs: Mint address of the Vault Share Position tokens

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when the vault was created

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Timestamp of the last update

fields.name: last_gav_update_at
docs: Timestamp of last NAV update

fields.name: last_resolve_at
docs: Timestamp of last Resolve

fields.name: manager_fee_rate
docs: Manager fee rate, 1000 = 1% (decimal = 3)

fields.name: last_gav_usd
docs: Last calculated Gross Asset Value (in USD & Deposit Token)

fields.name: total_deposit
docs: Total amount deposited into the vault

fields.name: total_withdrawal
docs: Total amount withdrawn from the vault

fields.name: fresh_capital
docs: (NOT USED YET) Vault Capital Tracking

fields.name: delegatee_1
docs: (NOT USED YET) Authorized account to manage the vault

fields.name: padding
docs: Padding for future use

fields.name: total_shares
docs: Total shares currently held

fields.name: total_cost
docs: Total cost basis for current shares (in token units)

fields.name: realized_pnl
docs: Realized profit/loss from past sells (in token units)
